name: guarana
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant common in Brazil that has seeds containing a large amount of caffeine : Guaraná has large leaves and clusters of white flowers. Guarana is a South American plant that is used as a stimulant.
Anselmo Garrido/Moment/GettyImages
a substance made from the seeds of the guaraná plant, used in drinks and pills that are said to give you energy: The drinks have been reformulated so that they do not contain supplements like caffeine and guaraná. Guarana does not in fact appear to boost brain power.
